response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and potential impact on your endeavors, I estimate its true worth to be $15,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a fantastic value, allowing you to benefit from the product's full capabilities without the usual high cost. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this valuable asset to your organization.", "product_price": 14000}
